list_definition.definition: (of eg a hill, stairs etc) rising with a sudden rather than a gradual slope

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The hill was too steep for me to cycle up

list_definition.definition: (of a price asked or demand made) unreasonable or too great

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He wants rather a steep price for his house, doesn’t he?
